verses.roman:
gadayā nirbibhedādrīn
śastra-durgāṇi sāyakaiḥ
cakreṇāgniṁ jalaṁ vāyuṁ
mura-pāśāṁs tathāsinā

synonyms: gadayā—with His club; nirbibheda—He broke through; adrīn—the hills; śastra-durgāṇi—the weapon obstacles; sāyakaiḥ—with His arrows; cakreṇa—with His disc; agnim—the fire; jalam—water; vāyum—and wind; mura-pāśān—the cable obstructions; tathā—similarly; asinā—with His sword.
translation: With His club the Lord broke through the rock fortifications; with His arrows, the weapon fortifications; with His disc, the fire, water and wind fortifications; and with His sword, the mura-pāśa cables.
